"Thank you, <%me>!":
"Matoi was delighted when she heard
you were going to bring back a Floating Continent
rock for her."

"Unfortunately, it seems her interest was mostly
scientific. After all, who wouldn't be interested in
a big, floating continent?"

"But never mind that. I'll go show her the rock right
away. Bye, now!"

"ありがとうございます
<%me>さん！"

"あなたが
集めてきてくれると聞いて
マトイさん喜んでましたよ。"

"……ただ、単に
おっきな大陸が浮かんでるっていう事に
興味がわいていたみたいでしたけど……"

"あっ、いえいえ、こちらの話です！
さっそく見せて来ますね！
じゃ！"
